Research

The pages listed below each detail an area of research that NISOx and NISOx collaborators are interested in and have worked on. For a full list of publications please see the NISOx publications page .

  • Clinical Trials fMRI
  • Multiple Testing Inference
  • Guidelines for Presenting Neuroimaging Analyses
